meanings.sent1: The little puppy let out a loud bowwow.
meanings.sent2: I heard a distant bowwow coming from the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent3: The bowwow of the dog woke up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The bowwow of the dog echoed through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The bowwow of the dog was so loud, it startled the birds nearby.

meanings.sent1: The bowwow of the big dog scared the mailman.
meanings.sent2: The bowwow of the guard dog kept intruders away.
meanings.sent3: The bowwow of the dog was so deep, it made the windows rattle.
meanings.sent4: The bowwow of the dog cut through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The bowwow of the dog was so powerful, it could be heard from far away.

meanings.sent1: I saw a cute little bowwow playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: The bowwow wagged its tail happily when its owner returned.
meanings.sent3: The bowwow followed its owner everywhere, like a loyal companion.
meanings.sent4: The bowwow greeted everyone with a friendly bark.
meanings.sent5: The bowwow's eyes sparkled with joy as it ran around the yard.
